titleStmt.title: Description of University of Pennsylvania Ms. Codex 980: Traité des droits du domaine du roy, leur origine, comme aussi le prejudice que sa majesté se fait en surchargeant ses sujets avec des impots

notesStmt.note: Text identical to UPenn Ms. Codex 979.
Similar but not identical titles are listed in A. A. Barbier, Dictionnaire des ouvrages anonymes, v.4 (Paris, 1879) (Zacour-Hirsch).

msContents.summary: Discussion in thirty chapters of the rights of the king of France during the reign of Louis XV, such as the rights of justice, litigation, and indemnity, often from a historical perspective, in support of the argument that the king has sufficient means of generating revenue without overburdening his subjects with taxes.

msItem.title: Traité des droits du domaine du roy, leur origine, comme aussi le prejudice que sa majesté se fait en surchargeant ses sujets avec des impots

supportDesc.extent: 102 leaves : 294 x 192 (246 x 139) mm. bound to 301 x 215 mm
supportDesc.foliation: Paper, iv (modern paper) + 102 + iv (modern paper); 1-202, [ii]; contemporary pagination in ink, upper outer corners.

layoutDesc.layout: Written in 21 long lines; outer margin marked by folding.

binding.p: Modern half parchment (Zacour-Hirsch). Ink bleeding through the paper makes some pages difficult to read.
